properties.query:
//Author: Matt Schwartz
//Description: Sourced from AuditLogs this analytic is triggered by domain authentication and federation settings being registered against the Azure Active Directory Service for a given tenant.
//False Positives: None known
let starttime = now(-14d);
let endtime = now();
let excludeSync = '06c9ca02-8129-473d-8ae9-f964890b5706';
// Sparrow Operations Types
let OpsTable = datatable(Category_: string, Operation: string) [
    'Domain_Operations', "Set domain authentication",
    'Domain_Operations', "Set federation settings on domain",
    'AppUpdate_Operations', "Update application",
    'AppUpdate_Operations', "Update application ? Certificates and secrets management",
    'ServicePrincipal_Operations', "Update service principal",
    'ServicePrincipal_Operations', "Add service principal", //added for testing purposes only
    'ServicePrincipal_Operations', "Add service principal credentials",
    'AppRoleAssignment_Operations', "Add app role assignment",
    'Consent_Operations', "Add OAuth2PermissionGrant",
    'Consent_Operations', "Consent to application",
    'SAMLToken_Operations', "UserLoggedIn",
    'SAMLToken_Operations', "UserLoginFailed",
    'PSMailbox_Operations', "MailboxLogin",
    'PSLogin_Operations', "UserLoggedIn",
    'PSLogin_Operations', "UserLoginFailed",
    'MailItemsAccessed_Operations', "MailItemsAccessed",
    'FileItems_Operations', "FileAccessed",
    'FileItems_Operations', "FileAccessedExtended"
];
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated between(starttime .. endtime) and InitiatedBy !has excludeSync
| mv-expand TargetResources, AdditionalDetails, InitiatedBy
| extend
    tr = parse_json(TargetResources),
    ad = parse_json(AdditionalDetails),
    ib = parse_json(InitiatedBy)
// | project tr.displayName
| evaluate bag_unpack(tr)
| evaluate bag_unpack(ad)
| evaluate bag_unpack(ib)
| extend id = column_ifexists('id', '')
| extend displayName = column_ifexists('displayName', '')
| extend modifiedProperties = column_ifexists('modifiedProperties', '')
| extend type = column_ifexists('type', '')
| extend app = column_ifexists('app', '')
| extend app = parse_json(app)
| join kind=inner OpsTable on $left.OperationName == $right.Operation
| where Category_ == "Domain_Operations"
| extend actor = iif(isnotempty(app.appId), app.appId, app.servicePrincipalId)
| project CreationTime = TimeGenerated, Id, Category, Operation = OperationName, Organization = "", RecordType = AADOperationType
    , ResultStatus = Result, LogonError = "", UserKey = Identity, UserType = type, Version = OperationVersion
    , Workload = AADTenantId, ClientIP = "", ObjectId = ResourceId, UserId = LoggedByService
    , AzureActiveDirectoryEventType = ActivityDisplayName, ExtendedProperties = app, ModifiedProperties = modifiedProperties
    , Actor = actor, ActorContextId = "", ActorIpAddress = "", InterSystemsId = "", IntraSystemId = "", SupportTicketId = ""
    , Target = displayName, TargetContextId = "", AppId = id, ClientAppId = "", ClientIPAddress = "", ClientInfoString = ""
    , ExternalAccess = "", InternalLogonType = "", LogonType = "", MailboxGuid = "", MailboxOwnerSid = "", MailboxOwnerUPN = ""
    , OperationProperties = "", OrganizationName = ResourceGroup, OriginatingServer = Resource, Folders = "", OperationCount = ""
    , LogonUserSid = "", ApplicationId = "", CorrelationId, EventSource = SourceSystem, ItemType = "", ListId = "", ListItemUniqueId = ""
    , Site = "", UserAgent = "", WebId = "", HighPriorityMediaProcessing = "", SourceFileExtension = "", SiteUrl = "", SourceFileName = ""
    , SourceRelativeUrl = ""
| sort by CreationTime desc
